name: Red Riding Hood - Star Crossed Lovers
description: Rediscover Red Riding Hood in an adventure with a surprisingly original twist based loosely on the tale by Charles Perrault!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP, Vista, 7, 8, 10 Processor: 2 GHz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 256 MB DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 1 GB available space
